headline: Cleveland Is Trying to Gain a New Nickname
author: Mike L. Ford
sentences: In Cleveland, it's the root of a brand, “Kindland,” launched in 2020 by an insurance salesman come social entrepreneur whose ultimate goal is “to make kindness the overriding, embedded, and unifying national value in America.” Writing for Politico Magazine, Kathy Gilsinan traces the roots and current status of the Kindland initiative.
